title: Legacy Health Patient Privacy Settlement 2025 - $15 for Meta/Google Data Sharing
amount: $15 cash + 1 year privacy monitoring ($1M identity theft insurance)
description: Legacy Health patients in Oregon and Washington may qualify for a $15 cash payment if you used your patient portal between 2019-2024. The class action settlement alleges Legacy Health shared your protected health information with Meta (Facebook) and Google using tracking pixels without consent, violating patient privacy rights. File your claim by March 16, 2026 to receive compensation plus free Medical Shield Complete privacy monitoring (1 year, $1M identity theft insurance).

title: City of Chicago v DoorDash, Inc., Caviar LLC
description: DoorDash settled with the City of Chicago over allegations that it listed Chicago restaurants on its platform without their consent or contractual agreements, violating a city ordinance requiring written agreements with restaurants. The settlement benefits small Chicago-based restaurants (nine or fewer locations) that were listed on DoorDash or Caviar between August 2019 and November 2025 without a contract. Eligible restaurants can receive up to $2,500 each by submitting an attestation form by the March 30, 2026 deadline.

title: Gryphon Healthcare Data Breach Settlement 2024 - Cash Payment for Exposed Medical Records
description: Were your medical records exposed in the July 2024 Gryphon Healthcare data breach? If your Social Security number, health insurance information, or personal health data was compromised in this Texas class action settlement, you may qualify for a cash payment. The cyberattack affected patients whose information was stored by Gryphon Healthcare, a medical billing services provider. Submit your claim by April 16, 2026 to receive compensation for the data security incident.
